Fiorentina are the side that Atalanta have faced the most times in Serie A after Italian national team games: 22 such matches in the top-flight between the two teams, with nine wins for the Viola, six for the Nerazzurri and seven draws. The most common score in Serie A meetings between Fiorentina and Atalanta is 0-0, recorded 15 times; however, the most recent 0-0 draw between the two teams was back in March, 2017.
